property.title: Preloader Settings
property.desc: Set options for the loading

property.title: Loading Caption
property.desc: Setting loading caption, show the name of this book by default.

property.title: Loading Caption Font Size
property.desc: Setting font size for loading caption

property.title: loading Caption Font Color
property.desc: Setting font size for loading caption

property.title: Loading Background Color
property.desc: Sets the loading color

property.title: Loading Picture
property.desc: Add an image that displays while loading the digital publication.

property.title: Loading Picture Height
property.desc: Setting height for loading picture.

property.title: Show Loading Animation
property.desc: Setting show or hide the loading animation.

property.title: Loading Display Time
property.desc: The shortest time(seconds) of loading interface display.

property.title: Loading Video
property.desc: After setting the loading video, the play button will be added in the loading interface. Click the play button to play the video. After the video playback, the book will be displayed.

property.title: Toolbar Settings
property.desc: Set options for the buttons and icons on the Toolbar.

property.title: General Settings
property.desc: Set button status on the Tool Bar

property.title: Logo Settings
property.desc: Settings Logo

property.title: Logo Image
property.desc: Insert logo into tool bar, the value of the logo width and height are 34 pixel.

property.title: Logo Link
property.desc: The page URL that will open when the user click the logo

property.title: Open in...
property.desc: Sets hyper links open window from logo. Blank: open in a new window; Self: open in the same window of the html.

property.title: Logo Height
property.desc: Settings Logo height.

property.title: Left Indent
property.desc: Settings Logo's position in X. Values could be positive and negative.

property.title: Top Indent
property.desc: Settings Logo's position in Y. Values could be positive and negative.

property.title: Toolbar Color
property.desc: Set toolbar color.

property.title: Icon Color
property.desc: Button icon color

property.title: Font Color
property.desc: Page number font color

property.title: Menu font color
property.desc: Menu font color

property.title: Always Show Toolbar On Mobile
property.desc: Whether or not always show Toolbar on mobile

property.title: Show toolbar
property.desc: Show or hide toolbar.

property.title: Form Font Color
property.desc: Set Font color for search, table of content, thumbnail, print, about, help etc.

property.title: Form Background Color
property.desc: Set background color for search, table of content, thumbnail, print, about, help etc.

property.title: Toolbar Alpha
property.desc: Set the alpha of toolbar(0-1.0), this property is not valid in some templates.

property.title: Curling Page Corner
property.desc: Curling the page corner when mouse stucking in the corner.

property.title: Toolbar Buttons
property.desc: Set button status on the Tool Bar

property.title: Mobile Buttons Layout
property.desc:
In the edit interface, you can drag and drop buttons to adjust the layout of the buttons.
PS: The functions of the buttons will be in a state of silence. Part of the style effect and functions are not enabled. This will be recovered after exiting the edit interface.

property.title: Show instructions on startup
property.desc: Show instructions on startup

property.title: Instructions Button Visible
property.desc: Enable/Disable Instructions Button (Help manual), for pad and phone.

property.title: Show Instruction On Start
property.desc: Show instruction on start, every device only one time.

property.title: Show Goto Buttons On Start
property.desc: Show goto buttons at first

property.title: Show QR Code
property.desc: Show/Hide QRCode Image.

property.title: Show Home Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the Homepage button.

property.title: Home Button Link
property.desc: The homepage URL, input http/https URL as web link, input %first page% as the first page of book.

property.title: About Button
property.desc: About/Contact button config

property.title: Show About Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the About button

property.title: Add Content
property.desc: The Content of the about/contact

property.title: Backward/Forward Button Visible
property.desc: Show/Hide the Backward/Forward button.

property.title: Show Share Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the Share button.

property.title: Social Sharing Settings
property.desc: Display specified or customized social share links

property.title: Add Current Page
property.desc: Add current page after link

property.title: Facebook Share Image
property.desc: Facebook share image, it is recommended to use images close to the 1.91:1 width and height ratio as much as possible, image must larger than 600*315.

property.title: Show Email Button
property.desc: Show Email Button

property.title: Email Subject
property.desc: Email Subject. Available Macros: {title} Html title, {link} Html URL, {thumb} thumbnail of page 1(format jpg or png).

property.title: Email Body
property.desc: Email Body. Available Macros: {title} Html title, {link} Html URL, {thumb} URL of thumbnail page 1(format jpg or png).

property.title: Show Thumbnails Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the Thumbnails button.

property.title: Thumbnail Color
property.desc: Thumbanil form color

property.title: Thumbnail Background Opacity
property.desc: Thumbnail background alpha(0-100)

property.title: Thumbnail Size
property.desc: Set thumbnail size.

property.title: Bookmarks Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the bookmark button.

property.title: Show TOC Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the table of content button.

property.title: Collapse Nodes of TOC
property.desc: Collapse nodes of table of content.

property.title: Show Search Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the Search button.

property.title: Minimum Search Characters
property.desc: Sets The least number of search characters

property.title: Search Font Color
property.desc: Sets search form font color.

property.title: Search Keyword Font Color
property.desc: Set search form keyword font color.

property.title: Hightlight Color
property.desc: Hightlight color of search text and selected text.

property.title: Select Text Button
property.desc: Select Text Button setting

property.title: Select Text Button Visible
property.desc: Show/Hide the Select Text button.

property.title: Select Text Button Icon
property.desc: Select Text Button Icon (PNG,JPG image); size from 18 to 35

property.title: Print Button
property.desc: Print settings

property.title: Show Print Button
property.desc: Enable/Disable Print Button

property.title: Watermark Image
property.desc: Watermark image or SWF only show in print out pages but won't show while viewing

property.title: Sound Button
property.desc: Sound settings

property.title: Show Sound Button
property.desc: Enable/Disable Sound Button

property.title: Page Flipping Sound
property.desc: On/Off the Flip Sound.

property.title: Background Sound File
property.desc: Select a background sound for the book.

property.title: Number of Repeats
property.desc: Sets -1: Plays background music all the time. Sets N (N>0): Plays N times then stop.

property.title: background sound volume
property.desc: Set background sound volume

property.title: Auto Flip Button
property.desc: Auto flipping settings

property.title: Show Auto Flip Button
property.desc: Enable/Disable autoplay Button

property.title: Auto Flip at Startup
property.desc: Enable/Disable auto flip button

property.title: Page Flipping Interval
property.desc: Auto Flip interval in seconds

property.title: Number of Repeats
property.desc: Auto flip loop count. Set this value to -1 to play forever.

property.title: Zoom Config
property.desc: Zoom settings

property.title: Show Zoom Button
property.desc: Show/Hide the zoom button.

property.title: Maximum Zoom Width
property.desc: The Maximum width (in pixel) within which the page can be zoomed in when in document mode.

property.title: Default Zoom Width
property.desc: The default size (in pixel) when the page zoom in.The minimum of this value should be Minimum Zoom Width and the maximum should be Maximum Zoom Width.

property.title: Flip Pages with Mouse Wheel
property.desc: Flip when mouseWheel.

property.title: Zoom Map
property.desc: Enable zoom map

property.title: Download Button
property.desc: Download settings

property.title: Show Download Button
property.desc: Enable/Disable Download Button

property.title: File Link
property.desc: Ensure Download URL is the samedomain as the flipbook uploaded URL. In batch convertion, you can use {PDF FileName} to represent the pdf file name in the download URL. For example: http://yourdomain.com/flipbook/{PDF FileName}

property.title: Download Setting
property.desc: Download settings

property.title: Phone settings
property.desc: Phone settings

property.title: Phone Button Visible
property.desc: Show/Hide Phone Button

property.title: Phone Button Icon
property.desc: Phone Button Icon (PNG,JPG image); size from 18 to 35

property.title: Phone Numbers
property.desc: Call phone number.

property.title: Annotation Button Visible
property.desc: Show/Hide Annotation Button.

property.title: Fullscreen Button
property.desc: Show / Hide Fullscreen Button

property.title: Magnifier Button
property.desc: Show magnifier button

property.title: Display Settings
property.desc: Customize templates for page-flipping eBooks

property.title: Background Settings
property.desc: The main background of the book

property.title: Gradient Color A
property.desc: Gradient Color A

property.title: Gradient Color B
property.desc: Gradient Color B

property.title: Gradient Angle
property.desc: Gradient Angle

property.title: Background Image File
property.desc: Select a background (image) for the book

property.title: Background Position
property.desc: The position of background image, you can select stretch, fill, fit or tile.

property.title: Background Opacity
property.desc: Set the opacity of background when embedded in frame, the value is between 0 and 100.

property.title: Dynamic Background
property.desc: Select a dynamic background for the book
property.valueLableSource: None,Petals Dancing,Fallen Leaves,Snow,Slow Bubble,Fast Bubble,Light Rain,Heavy Rain,Firefly,Space Ship,Space Travel,Twinkling stars,Meteor,Sunshine,Cloud,SunCloud,Balloon,Moon

property.title: Shadow Settings
property.desc: Set the book shadow and alpha

property.title: Left Page Shadow Width
property.desc: Set the left page shadow width

property.title: Left Page Opacity
property.desc: Set the left page alpha

property.title: Right Page Shadow Width
property.desc: Set the right page shadow width

property.title: Right Page Opacity
property.desc: Set the right page alpha

property.title: Show TopLeft Shadow
property.desc: Show shadow on the top left side.

property.title: page highlight type
property.desc: set page highlight type

property.title: Cover Config
property.desc: Cover Config.

property.title: Hard Cover
property.desc: Enable hard page

property.title: Hard Cover Border Width
property.desc: Hard Cover Border Width

property.title: Border Color
property.desc: Set the cover border color

property.title: Outer Cover Border
property.desc: Outer Cover Border

property.title: Corner Rounding
property.desc: Corner Rounding

property.title: Book Margins On Mobile
property.desc: Set margins for books on pad or phone.

property.title: Left Margin
property.desc: Set left margin to the contents of book.

property.title: Top Margin
property.desc: Set top margin to the contents of book.

property.title: Right Margin
property.desc: Set right margin to the contents of book.

property.title: Bottom Margin
property.desc: Set bottom margin between tool bar and the bottom of book.

property.title: Page Background Color
property.desc: Set the Page background color

property.title: Show Filp Shortcut Buttons
property.desc: Show/Hide the Flip Shortcut button.

property.title: Show Filp Shortcut Buttons On Mobile
property.desc: Show/Hide the Flip Shortcut button.

property.title: Book Binding Type
property.desc: Select the book binding type to show book cover shadow.
property.valueLableSource: Flat Stitching,Press Stitching,Side Stitching,Saddle Stitching,Sewing,Fluted,Loose leaf,Loose leaf2

property.title: Right-to-left Language
property.desc: Enable Right to Left

property.title: Flip Direction
property.desc: Flip direction

property.title: Page Flipping Time
property.desc: Sets page flipping time in seconds. 0.3 second is recommended.

property.title: Always Center the Book
property.desc: Sets Yes to retain Flip Book in the Center of the Window

property.title: Default Display Mode
property.desc: Sets flip style

property.title: Page Display Mode
property.desc: Sets show double page or single page.

property.title: Start on Double-page
property.desc: Set the flipping book to start on double-page or not. If you choose "Yes", the book will display without a frontpage (or cover), presenting simply two pages at a time. If your book has odd number pages, you can try and set this value to YES.

property.title: Page Switching Prompt
property.desc: Single and double page switching prompt.

property.title: Page Thickness Type
property.desc: Select the page thickness type.

property.title: Page Thickness Color
property.desc: Select the page thickness color.

property.title: Single Mode Deny Flip Last Page
property.desc: Single mode deny flip last page

property.title: Show Thickness On Mobile
property.desc: Show thickness on mobile mode, pc mode use the value of [Page Thickness Type].

property.title: Single Page Full On Mobile
property.desc: The background color of the page fills the screen when the phone is single page

property.title: Disable Right-click Popup Menu
property.desc: Do not show the popup menu when right clicking the flipbook.

property.title: Restore Previous Session
property.desc: Sets to yes to remembers the last viewed page and ask the reader to open the flipbook on this page or not.

property.title: Page Numeration
property.desc: Sets page number caption.

property.title: Total Pages Caption
property.desc: Specifies the total pages number text in the pagination block.

property.title: Page Number Caption
property.desc: Set caption for each page of your book. The format is: acture page number:caption;. For example, if you set 1:I;2:II;3:III;4:IV;5:V;6:First Unit;7:;8-100:1+, it will show I for the first page, II the second page, III for the third page, IV for the forth page, V for the fifth page, First Unit for the sixth page, empty/nothing shown for the seventh page, then show 1,2,3...93for page 8 to 100 (1+ means show caption from number 1, and increase 1 corresponding to the later pages). Another example, you have 30 pages book and you want to show page numbers from 3001 to 3030, then you can set caption as 1-30:3001+ The caption value also can be set with Macro: StartPageIndex-EndPageIndex:any string{N/R/r+StartNumber}any other string (N means Arabic number, R means uppercase Roman number, r means lowercase Roman number, + means increase progressively). For example ,if you want to show page numbers for a 1000 page book as P6,P7,P8...P1005, you may use this: 1-1000:P{N+6}; if you want to show page number for a 10 page book like, Page I#, Page II#, Page III#, Page IV#... Page X#, you can simply use 1-10:Page {R+}#.

property.title: Book Margins
property.desc: Set margins for page-flipping eBooks

property.title: Top Margin
property.desc: Set top margin to the contents of book.

property.title: Bottom Margin
property.desc: Set bottom margin between tool bar and the bottom of book.

property.title: Left Margin
property.desc: Set left margin to the contents of book.

property.title: Right Margin
property.desc: Set right margin to the contents of book.

property.title: Mini Mode Config
property.desc: When the display area of book is too small, we will change to mini mode.

property.title: Hide Full Screen Prompts
property.desc: Show/Hide in Mini Mode Full Screen Prompt

property.title: Max Width
property.desc: If display width is less than this value, we will change book to mini mode.

property.title: Max Height
property.desc: If display height is less than this value, we will change book to mini mode.

property.title: Show at Startup
property.desc: Set window initial show options for left panel

property.title: High Definition Display
property.desc: Display compact texts, works with [Best quality] pdf import option.

property.title: Large Logo Setting
property.desc: Define settings for the Large Logo

property.title: Large Logo
property.desc: The logo icon will be added in front of the bar, and the height is fixed to 55 pixels, the width will be adjusted acording to the scale.

property.title: Large Logo URL
property.desc: The page URL that will open when the user click the Large Logo

property.title: Large Logo Position
property.desc: Set Logo position for flash

property.title: Large Logo's Link Open Window
property.desc: Set large logo links open window. Blank: open in a new window; Self: open in the same window of the flash.

property.title: Logo Size Setting
property.desc: Logo Size Setting

property.title: Fix Logo Size
property.desc: Fix / Not Fix the Logo Size.

property.title: Logo Fix Width
property.desc: Logo Fix Width

property.title: Logo Fix Height
property.desc: Logo Fix Height

property.title: Support Double Click Page To Zoom
property.desc: Support double click page to zoom, and support zoom by two fingers on mobile.

property.title: Show Help Content At First
property.desc: Set show help content at first.

property.title: HTML Settings
property.desc: Set options for control settings in page-flipping eBooks

property.title: Show Page Number In URL
property.desc: The page number at the end of book url changes while flipping the book page.

property.title: Security Settings
property.desc: Set security options to protect the flash page content.

property.value: Please contact the author to access the web
property.title: Password Tips
property.desc: You can customize the text for the password tips. If you want to inform readers to get the password for the flipbook with password tips, you can edit some message as the tips. Also you can lead readers to get the password tips by using the HTML link with the following format: Flip Builder
property.defalutValue: Please contact the author to access the web

property.title: Embed Config
property.desc: Embed Config

property.title: Only Embedded Read
property.desc: The book can only be read when embedded in a web page

property.title: Prompt When Not Embedded
property.desc: Prompt when not embedded in web page

property.title: Link Settings
property.desc: Links settings...

property.title: Open Links in...
property.desc: Sets hyper links open window. Blank: open in a new window; Self: open in the same window of the html.

property.title: Enable Tooltips
property.desc: Show or hide link hint in page.

property.title: Google Analytics ID
property.desc: In the HTML output format, you can add statistics by using google analytics. You can get more infomation about Google Analytics ID from http://www.google.com/analytics/
